LanguageData.CPS.resetall.label: Manual config reset
LanguageData.CPS.resetall.confirm: This will reset ALL values to vanilla values for all pawnkinds
LanguageData.CPS.resetone.confirm: This will reset the values for {0} to vanilla values
LanguageData.CPS.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.CPS.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.CPS.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.CPS.biocoding.tooltip: Chance of biocoded items for the chosen pawnkind
LanguageData.CPS.chemicaladdiction.tooltip: Chance of having a chemical addiction for the chosen pawnkind
LanguageData.CPS.combatenhancingdrugs.tooltip: Chance of having combat enhancing drugs for the chosen pawnkind
LanguageData.CPS.techhediffs.tooltip: Chance of having artificial bodyparts for the chosen pawnkind
LanguageData.CPS.techhediffsmoney.tooltip: The amount of money the pawnkind have to "buy" hediffs
LanguageData.CPS.headgear.tooltip: Chance of headgear for the chosen pawnkind
LanguageData.CPS.combatpower.tooltip: Power of the pawn when calculating raid-sizes. The higher the value, the fewer will spawn
LanguageData.CPS.royaltitlechance.tooltip: Chance of pawn spawning with a royal title
LanguageData.CPS.weapontags.tooltip: What weapon-tags are allowed for the pawn to spawn with
LanguageData.CPS.appareltags.tooltip: What apparel-tags are allowed for the pawn to spawn with
LanguageData.CPS.techhedifftags.tooltip: What tech hediff-tags (implants and bionics) are allowed for the pawn to spawn with
LanguageData.CPS.weaponmoney.tooltip: The amount of money the pawnkind have to "buy" weapons
LanguageData.CPS.apparelmoney.tooltip: The amount of money the pawnkind have to "buy" apparel
LanguageData.CPS.deathacidifier.tooltip: If the pawn should spawn with a death acidifier
